title: Junior Software Developer
description:
About DeepTech AI:

DeepTech AI develops enterprise-grade ML automation platforms for Fortune 500 clients. Our engineering roles require autonomy and production deployment experience.

  • Architect, deploy, and maintain microservice APIs in Python using Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud MLOps frameworks.
  • Lead end-to-end project delivery including code review, CI/CD pipeline setup, and infrastructure as code (Terraform).
  • Collaborate directly with clients and business analysts to translate business needs into technical requirements.
  • Requirements: 4+ years professional software engineering, strong Python, container orchestration, stakeholder management.

title: Lead Help Desk Specialist
description:
About NexGen IT:

NexGen IT provides technical support solutions for small and mid-sized businesses. We value patience, empathy, and clear documentation.

  • Answer incoming customer calls and respond to tickets for password resets, basic printer issues, and Microsoft Office troubleshooting.
  • Escalate complex networking issues to Level 2 and update internal knowledge bases.
  • Coordinate with other support team members to ensure customer satisfaction.
  • Requirements: Excellent communication skills, 1+ years in helpdesk or customer service, basic Active Directory knowledge.

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
About CyberLogic:

CyberLogic is an early-stage startup building custom internal tooling. We are seeking flexible, creative engineers to develop and prototype UI concepts rapidly.

  • Convert detailed Figma designs into accessible, performant React components.
  • Work directly with the CTO to iterate on customer feedback and deploy MVP features weekly.
  • Refactor legacy JavaScript/jQuery code into modern frameworks as needed.
  • Requirements: 1+ years JavaScript, some React experience, willingness to work outside comfort zone in a fast-paced environment.

title: Senior IT Analyst
description:
About EasyRetail:

EasyRetail operates a chain of independent grocery stores, using custom legacy POS and inventory systems. We offer a supportive, team-driven environment with basic training.

  • Manually update product stock numbers and pricing in Excel and a simple SQL-based system.
  • Assist store managers with basic password resets and email account creation.
  • Perform weekly paper-based inventory reconciliations.
  • Requirements: Basic Excel and data entry, comfort with repetitive tasks, attention to detail, no prior IT analyst experience required.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description:
About AlphaByte:

AlphaByte is a global SaaS provider, looking for early-career engineers to join product squads. Outstanding interns may receive return offers for permanent roles.

  • Help design distributed systems and APIs with the team, write automated test suites, and deploy React/Node services to AWS.
  • Participate in sprint planning, peer reviews, and customer demo days.
  • Mentorship from experienced senior developers.
  • Requirements: Final-year CS or related studies, some coursework projects in React/Node, eagerness to learn and collaborate.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
About Nimbus Labs:

We are a cloud-first SaaS scale-up specialising in secure, high-uptime enterprise software. Our fully distributed team prioritises automation, reliability, and innovation in every deployment.

  • Architect and deploy scalable AWS-based infrastructure using Docker and Kubernetes in a GitOps environment.
  • Automate CI/CD with Terraform and Jenkins, improving delivery velocity and system robustness.
  • Own incident response and monitoring using Prometheus, Grafana, and custom alerting scripts.
  • Advise on cloud security best practices; document infrastructure and collaborate with global teams.
  • Requirements: 3+ years in DevOps, strong scripting (Bash/Python), production container orchestration, remote teamwork.

title: Full Stack Developer (React/Node)
description:
About Apex Solutions:

Apex Solutions builds modern, intuitive SaaS tools for small business automation. Our teams value ownership, clean code, and measurable impact.

  • Lead feature development in our web app using React (with Redux) and Node.js (TypeScript/Express).
  • Design and document REST/GraphQL APIs, integrate with third-party SaaS providers, and optimise queries in PostgreSQL.
  • Participate in agile sprints, code reviews, and end-to-end automated testing.
  • Requirements: 2+ years React/Node, experience with REST/GraphQL APIs, SQL proficiency, agile team delivery.

title: Data Engineer
description:
About DataWave:

DataWave is a European analytics startup transforming legacy financial systems with big data and ML. We offer fully remote contracts across EU time zones.

  • Design, build, and maintain ETL pipelines using Apache Spark, Airflow, and custom Python modules.
  • Optimise large-scale SQL (Postgres) and NoSQL (MongoDB) data workflows for analytical reporting and ML feature stores.
  • Partner with data science to deliver high-integrity, well-documented datasets.
  • Requirements: Advanced Python, strong SQL, real-world ETL, familiarity with AWS or GCP.

title: Security Analyst (SOC)
description:
About Sentinel Cyber:

Sentinel Cyber protects mid-market organisations across the US. Our SOC team is distributed and operates 24/7 on a rotating on-call roster.

  • Respond to and document real-world security incidents using Splunk and Elastic SIEM platforms.
  • Perform hands-on penetration testing and vulnerability assessments.
  • Develop automation tools and playbooks (Python) to streamline investigation and reporting workflows.
  • Requirements: 2+ years SOC/SIEM, familiarity with cloud platforms, scripting skills, written incident reporting.

title: Cloud Architect (Azure)
description:
About CloudMatrix:

CloudMatrix is an Australian digital consultancy with a focus on robust, modern enterprise deployments in Azure. We offer remote work, learning stipends, and clear technical progression.

  • Design and review end-to-end Azure architectures for multi-tenant SaaS products (cost, performance, compliance).
  • Automate deployments with Terraform, ARM templates, and CI/CD in Azure DevOps.
  • Advise on migration and hybrid cloud patterns, support customer solution architects, and champion best practices.
  • Requirements: 5+ years architecture/design, Azure expert, strong scripting, excellent communication.

title: Backend Engineer (Go/Microservices)
description:
About OptiCode:

OptiCode delivers scalable, event-driven B2B platforms for logistics and supply chain. Our tech stack is modern, containerised, and focused on fast, reliable deployments.

  • Implement distributed microservices in Go, leveraging REST/gRPC APIs and Docker/Kubernetes orchestration.
  • Integrate with message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ) and support high-throughput data processing.
  • Enforce automated testing, code reviews, and CI/CD as part of a mature dev process.
  • Requirements: Strong Go, microservices, containerised production deployments, async messaging.

title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
description:
About CoreTech:

CoreTech is a US-based SaaS provider powering mission-critical real-time analytics. We pride ourselves on engineering excellence, proactive ops, and customer-first reliability.

  • Monitor and automate Linux production systems to achieve 99.99% uptime, using Ansible, Datadog, and custom tools.
  • Own incident detection and root cause analysis, driving continuous improvement and blameless postmortems.
  • Enhance deployment, scaling, and rollback pipelines to support peak loads and rapid recovery.
  • Requirements: 3+ years SRE/ops, scripting (Bash/Python), automation, strong troubleshooting, 24/7 on-call rotation.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
About AI Nexus:

AI Nexus builds large-scale, production-ready AI for fintech and healthtech clients. We foster continuous learning, open-source contributions, and the latest in MLOps best practices.

  • Design, train, and deploy deep learning models using TensorFlow and PyTorch for computer vision and NLP projects.
  • Develop scalable ML pipelines and data versioning using MLflow, Docker, and Kubernetes.
  • Collaborate with product teams to translate research into real-world, customer-facing solutions.
  • Requirements: Deep learning portfolio, strong Python, MLOps experience, cloud deployment, teamwork.

title: UI/UX Developer (Web)
description:
About PixelPerfect:

PixelPerfect is an award-winning digital agency focused on accessible, human-centric web design. We support remote collaboration and professional development.

  • Design and implement pixel-perfect, accessible interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Figma.
  • Work closely with cross-functional product teams to iterate and validate UI/UX decisions.
  • Champion WCAG and accessibility-first practices in every deliverable.
  • Requirements: 2+ years UI/UX, strong HTML/CSS, portfolio demonstrating accessible design, team player.

title: Network Engineer (Cisco/Firewall)
description:
About NetSecure:

NetSecure provides managed IT and network security for enterprises nationwide. We combine deep vendor partnerships with hands-on support and training.

  • Design, configure, and maintain enterprise-grade Cisco routers, switches, and firewall appliances across multiple sites.
  • Diagnose complex network performance issues and implement robust security controls.
  • Document architectures, changes, and incident response protocols.
  • Requirements: CCNP or equivalent, 3+ years hands-on network administration, incident management, firewall rule management.
